mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.username, t1.nickname, t1.password, t1.status, t1.dept_id, t1.avatar, t1.mobile, t1.email, t1.gender, t3.code as role_code, t3.id as role_id, t3.name as role_name, t3.status as role_status, t3.sort as role_sort, t3.data_scope as role_data_scope FROM sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN sys_role t3 ON t3.id = t2.role_id AND t3.status = 1 WHERE t1.username = #{username}
